summary: Returning from prison, aged gangster Kabali confronts those who had destroyed his life. While doing so, he learns about what had happened to his family when he was gone.
cast: Rajinikanth|Winston Chao|Radhika Apte|Dhansika|Kalaiyarasan|Dinesh|John Vijay|Kishore Kumar G.|Riythvika|Mime Gopi|Hari|Nassar|Uday Mahesh|Gajaraj|Vinoth|Nandakumar|Sampath Ram|Sangili Murugan|Vittal Prasad|Rosyam Nor|Lingesh|Rama|R. Amarendran|Ramesh Thilak|Soundarya Nandakumar|Lijeesh|Subathra|Janaki|Udhayabanu Maheshwaran|Purusohthaman|Siva|Rajesh|Prabhakaran|Master Anush|Sanjeev Kumar|Selvam|Dato Rosham Nor|Vishwanath|Jeya Perumal|Arumugham Nellai|Ambedkar|Madras Dinesh Mani|Indhirajith|Mano|Harish|Bala|Sri Chakra|Kannayiram|Jalaluddin Hassan|Yusof B. Mohd Kassim|Eddy Sharizan
title: Kabali
